snippet: Lamar Odom’s brief venture into European basketball has been cut short by a back injury, according to his Spanish club.
abstract: Lamar Odom's brief venture into European basketball is cut short by back injury that will keep him off court for duration of his two-month contract with Spanish club Baskonia; Odom played total of 23 minutes in two games; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lamar Odom’s brief venture into European basketball has been cut short by a back injury, according to his Spanish club.
